LandingPage.title: Ole Håvard Furuseth Bergan
LandingPage.infoAboutMe: Hello, my name is Ole Håvard Furuseth Bergan, I am 26 years old and come from Kongsberg
LandingPage.infoFreeTime: I moved to Vestlandet in 2019. In my spare time I like to exercise, go for walks, play games, cook and watch anime.
LandingPage.infoCharity: A lot of my free time is also spent on charity. Among other things, I am the financial manager in Norwegian People's Aid's Solidarity Youth Bergen, and take part in most of the activities we organise.
LandingPage.infoPersona: I am love to learn new things, and like challenges and problem solving. This is one of the biggest reasons why I love to code, and find this rewarding and challenging. If I encounter a challenge, I smile on the inside as it means that I have even more to learn and it gives me enormous joy and motivation to improve.

Projects.projectPokedex: In this project, I used vanilla javascript where I created a pokedex using an API call, which goes through all the 898 Pokémon, and shows different types of information I have extracted.
Projects.projectParallax: In this project I created an beautiful parallax website that is optimized for all screen sizes and learned a lot about styling images.
Projects.projectSolarsystem: In this group project, we have created the entire solar system. What I worked on the most here was the setup of the navbar, the footer, i18next and getting the planets to rotate on the front page. The project has a main focus on the use of Styled Components and good routing.
